test.instr: (:ins (:task (putin X Y) (:cond (sort X can) (color X white) (type Y container) (sort Y washmachine))) (:task (open X) (:cond (sort X cupboard) (type X container))) (:task (putdown X) (:cond (sort X can) (color X yellow))) (:task (goto X) (:cond (sort X desk))) (:info (on X Y) (:cond (sort X cup) (color X yellow) (sort Y chair))) )
test.nl:
Put the white can in washmachine. Open the cupboard. Put down the yellow can. Go to desk. The yellow cup is on chair.
Put the green bottle on the desk. Put the yellow cup in the cupboard. Give the yellow cup to human. Pick the red remotecontrol up.
